Sentencas: In this paper a numerical model is,developed for a novel reactor combining a Solid Oxide Electrolyzer Cell (SOEC) section with a Fischer Tropsch like section for methane production under pressurized & temperature-gradient condition.
Titulo: Modelling of SOEC-FT reactor: Pressure effects on methanation process

Sentencas: Governing equations for mass, momentum, charge transport are solved with Finite Element Method.
Titulo: Modelling of SOEC-FT reactor: Pressure effects on methanation process

Sentencas: The chemical reaction kinetics of reversible water gas shift reaction and reversible methanation reaction in Ni/YSZ cathode are fully considered.
Titulo: Modelling of SOEC-FT reactor: Pressure effects on methanation process

Sentencas: The model is validated by comparing simulation results with experimental data.
Titulo: Modelling of SOEC-FT reactor: Pressure effects on methanation process

Sentencas: Parametric simulations are conducted to understand the physical-chemical processes in the reactor with a focus on the pressure effect.
Titulo: Modelling of SOEC-FT reactor: Pressure effects on methanation process

Sentencas: It is predicted that the optimal operating pressure is around 3 bar, beyond which the CH4 conversion ratio (2.5 times enhanced than 1 bar operating) cannot be further increased.
Titulo: Modelling of SOEC-FT reactor: Pressure effects on methanation process

Sentencas: It is also found that it is feasible to operate the pressurized SOEC at a lower temperature for CH4 production with improved catalyst activity.
Titulo: Modelling of SOEC-FT reactor: Pressure effects on methanation process
